content.html: Trying to use a Mac again properly. It's just so comically bad! A short (though no doubt growing) thread of basic things that Macs can't do. (And, no, I won't be installing random apps to fix Apple's shortcomings.)
content.value:
Trying to use a Mac again properly. It's just so comically bad!

A short (though no doubt growing) thread of basic things that Macs can't do.

(And, no, I won't be installing random apps to fix Apple's shortcomings.)
